EmailTemplate.name: NW Fundraising Ambassador Intro Email 2015
EmailTemplate.subject: The Challenge - Fundraising Ambassador Role
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName} Welcome to The Challenge Fundraising Ambassador Team!
We hope have enjoyed the NCS experience so far and are looking forward to the next step
of your journey.
Whatâ€™s next?
You will receive your Fundraising Ambassador Info pack at graduation.
After that?
Fundraising Ambassadors will be meeting up Saturday October 17th 2015
Meet up with friends new and old
We'll keep you updated with all the info please email tcs.northwest@the-challenge.org if you change your email address or have any questions
We look forward to seeing you!
Love
Northwest TCS
